channel.title: INtravel
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtravel, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: TPG exclusive: I was the first journalist to see JW Marriott Camelback Inn's $25M spa renovation
item.description: This historic Arizona resort is kicking off its 90th anniversary year with a $25 million luxurious spa renovation. TPG has the first look.

item.title: Fast-growing Breeze adds 4 cities in 14-route expansion; introductory fares from $39 one-way
item.description: The leisure carrier will add four cities — three new and one returning — amid a broader 14-route expansion that will kick off in May.

item.title: How I saved $241 on a Hyatt stay near Mount Rushmore using Chase points
item.description: Heading to Mount Rushmore or Badlands National Park? Learn how you can score a great redemption in Rapid City, South Dakota, located just minutes from...

item.title: A new all-inclusive brand with resorts in Mexico, the Caribbean and Spain will officially join World of Hyatt in March
item.description: Bahia Principe all-inclusive resorts will join World of Hyatt on March 24, 2026.

item.title: Deal of the day: Fly nonstop to Egypt for as few as 40,000 Aeroplan points
item.description: Points and miles deal of the day: Here's how you can fly to Egypt using travel rewards in 2026.
